# TruffleHog exclude patterns for FlakeGuard
# One regex pattern per line
# Synchronized with Gitleaks configuration for consistency

# ============================================================================
# SYSTEM AND BUILD FILES
# ============================================================================

# Git and version control
^\.git/.*

# Node modules and dependencies  
^node_modules/.*
^\.pnpm-store/.*
^pnpm-lock\.yaml$

# Build outputs and artifacts
^dist/.*
^build/.*
^coverage/.*
^\.next/.*
^\.turbo/.*
^out/.*
^apps/docs/build/.*

# Temporary files
^tmp/.*
^temp/.*
^temporary/.*

# Lock files
.*\.lock$
.*lock\.json$
.*lock\.yaml$

# Cache directories
^\.cache/.*
^\.tmp/.*

# ============================================================================
# DOCUMENTATION AND EXAMPLES
# ============================================================================

# All markdown documentation
.*\.md$

# Documentation directories
^docs/.*
^apps/docs/.*
^apps/api/docs/.*
^apps/api/prisma/README\.md$

# Agent files
^\.claude/.*

# Phase documentation
^P[0-9]+.*\.md$

# Example and template files
.*\.example$
.*\.sample$
.*\.template$
^\.env\..*\.example$
^\.flakeguard\.yml\.example$

# ============================================================================
# TEST FILES AND FIXTURES
# ============================================================================

# Test directories
.*/__tests__/.*
.*/__mocks__/.*
^test/.*
^tests/.*
^fixtures/.*

# Test files by extension
.*\.test\..*
.*\.spec\..*
.*\.integration\.test\..*
.*\.unit\.test\..*
.*\.performance\.test\..*

# Test configurations
^docker-compose\.test\.yml$
^docker-compose\.test\.yaml$
.*\.test\.yml$
.*\.test\.yaml$

# Test scripts
^scripts/test-.*
^scripts/.*test.*

# ============================================================================
# CONFIGURATION AND DOCKER FILES
# ============================================================================

# Docker files (contain example credentials)
^docker-compose.*\.yml$
^docker-compose.*\.yaml$
^compose.*\.yml$
^compose.*\.yaml$
^Dockerfile.*
^\.dockerignore$

# Configuration files
^tsconfig.*\.json$
^eslint\.config.*
^\.eslintrc.*
^\.prettierrc.*
^vitest\.config.*

# ============================================================================
# GENERATED AND PROCESSED FILES
# ============================================================================

# Minified and source maps
.*\.min\.js$
.*\.min\.css$
.*\.map$

# TypeScript declaration files
.*\.d\.ts$

# Bundle analysis
.*bundle-analyzer.*
.*stats.*\.json$

# Log files
.*\.log$
^logs/.*

# Editor and IDE files
^\.vscode/.*
^\.idea/.*
.*\.swp$
.*\.swo$
